mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_agent(agent_id, agent_name, description, channel, strategy,status, create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{description}, #{channel},#{strategy}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_agent SET agent_name = #{agentName}, description = #{description}, channel = #{channel}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, agent_id, agent_name, description, channel, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_agent WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
